title: GQ Redesign
content:
I hate to be banging this again, but I was wondering if anyone knew when GQ got redesigned. I know it's being geared towards a younger crowd these days. Also, I saw that Rolling Stone has redesigned a few of it's pages as well.   
   
xo   
davy
author: david_fung

comments.content:
Rolling Stone - Andy Cowles is the Art Director (if you like his style see Q or Mojo).   
   
And - GQ - well. What do you want me to say about The Famed AD Fred Woodward?   
   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051123012516im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
The Lord of The Ring
do you guys know when the redesigned happened fr both of these? well partial redesign of rolling stone. . and redesign of GQ.
David, I don't know, but surely your local library has subscriptions and archives for these magazines. You ought to be able to find out from that.
